name: Ev O.S. (alpha 0.2)
description:
This game is in an early stage of developpement: any of the features (except the character customizer) are fully fleshed out and can at any moment be removed from the game ! BUT the ones described here are most likely going to stay, just change in execution and use !

For now, the only part of the game you can play is on this interface: the Experimental Virtual Operating System (Ev O.S. for short)

You can customize the look of it using the "customization" opition, or by entering some lines of codes (by pressing TAB on your keyboard). Customise the color, icons, audio, logo, time style and language you play with, and more to come (like volume for exemple)...

You can (and in the futur, should) customize your own virtual Explorer

For now, you have access to two body types, and many gear to chose and customise the colors of, with even a logo customiser

In the futur, at least three more body types will be added. And two of them will not be humanoid

You can also export your Explorer, so your friends can import it and play with it ! (for now they will only be able to see and modify if, but in the futur they'll get way more out of this)

And if you really like to type on your keyboard, why not use the extended code system ? (since it's a demo, all the gear parts are already unlocked: making it mostly useless)

here are all the curent commands to customize your interface, you can see them all in by entering a command in the extended terminal

- To open the extended terminal: extendedCode.START()you then need to open the list of command (that will be entered in the normal terminal):

terminal: commandList
and then close the extended terminal: extendedCode.STOP()
